org.compiere.plaf
Class CompiereTheme

java.lang.Object
  javax.swing.plaf.metal.MetalTheme
      org.compiere.plaf.CompiereTheme

public class CompiereTheme
extends javax.swing.plaf.metal.MetalTheme

OpenXpertya User definable Theme (if used in Metal L&F). In other Environments, it provides UI extensions (e.g. Error Color)

Version:
$Id: CompiereTheme.java,v 1.14 2005/03/11 20:34:36 jjanke Exp $
Author:
Comunidad de Desarrollo openXpertya *Basado en Codigo Original Modificado, Revisado y Optimizado de: * Jorg Janke
